00040 #define ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS      typename    Derived, typename    Pointer, typename    Value, typename    System, typename    Traversal, typename    Reference, typename    Difference
00041 #define ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(i) typename Derived##i, typename Pointer##i, typename Value##i, typename System##i, typename Traversal##i, typename Reference##i, typename Difference##i
00042 
00043 #define ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS         Derived,    Pointer,    Value,    System,    Traversal,    Reference,    Difference
00044 #define ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(i) Derived##i, Pointer##i, Value##i, System##i, Traversal##i, Reference##i, Difference##i

00052 // This forward declaration is required for the friend declaration
00053 // in iterator_core_access
00054 template<ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS> class iterator_facade;
00055 
00056 class iterator_core_access
00057 {
00058     // declare our friends
00059     template<ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS> friend class iterator_facade;
00060 
00061     // iterator comparisons are our friends
00062     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00063               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00064     friend bool
00065     operator ==(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00066                 iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00067 
00068     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00069               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00070     friend bool
00071     operator !=(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00072                 iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00073 
00074     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00075               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00076     friend bool
00077     operator <(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00078                iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00079 
00080     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00081               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00082     friend bool
00083     operator >(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00084                iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00085 
00086     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00087               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00088     friend bool
00089     operator <=(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00090                 iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00091 
00092     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00093               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00094     friend bool
00095     operator >=(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00096                 iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00097 
00098     // iterator difference is our friend
00099     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00100               ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00101     friend
00102       typename thrust::detail::distance_from_result<
00103         iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)>,
00104         iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)>
00105       >::type
00106     operator-(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00107               iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs);
00108 
00109     template<typename Facade>
00110     __host__ __device__
00111     static typename Facade::reference dereference(Facade const& f)
00112     {
00113       return f.dereference();
00114     }
00115 
00116     template<typename Facade>
00117     __host__ __device__
00118     static void increment(Facade& f)
00119     {
00120       f.increment();
00121     }
00122 
00123     template<typename Facade>
00124     __host__ __device__
00125     static void decrement(Facade& f)
00126     {
00127       f.decrement();
00128     }
00129 
00130     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00131     __host__ __device__
00132     static bool equal(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00133     {
00134       return f1.equal(f2);
00135     }
00136 
00137     // XXX TODO: Investigate whether we need both of these cases
00138     //template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00139     //__host__ __device__
00140     //static bool equal(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2, mpl::true_)
00141     //{
00142     //  return f1.equal(f2);
00143     //}
00144 
00145     //template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00146     //__host__ __device__
00147     //static bool equal(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2, mpl::false_)
00148     //{
00149     //  return f2.equal(f1);
00150     //}
00151 
00152     template <class Facade>
00153     __host__ __device__
00154     static void advance(Facade& f, typename Facade::difference_type n)
00155     {
00156       f.advance(n);
00157     }
00158 
00159     // Facade2 is convertible to Facade1,
00160     // so return Facade1's difference_type
00161     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00162     __host__ __device__
00163     static typename Facade1::difference_type
00164       distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2, thrust::detail::true_type)
00165     {
00166       return -f1.distance_to(f2);
00167     }
00168 
00169     // Facade2 is not convertible to Facade1,
00170     // so return Facade2's difference_type
00171     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00172     __host__ __device__
00173     static typename Facade2::difference_type
00174       distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2, thrust::detail::false_type)
00175     {
00176       return f2.distance_to(f1);
00177     }
00178     
00179     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00180     __host__ __device__
00181     static typename thrust::detail::distance_from_result<Facade1,Facade2>::type
00182       distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00183     {
00184       // dispatch the implementation of this method upon whether or not
00185       // Facade2 is convertible to Facade1
00186       return distance_from(f1, f2,
00187         typename thrust::detail::is_convertible<Facade2,Facade1>::type());
00188     }
00189 
00190     //
00191     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00192     //
00193     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS>
00194     __host__ __device__
00195     static Derived& derived(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS>& facade)
00196     {
00197       return *static_cast<Derived*>(&facade);
00198     }
00199 
00200     template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS>
00201     __host__ __device__
00202     static Derived const& derived(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS> const& facade)
00203     {
00204       return *static_cast<Derived const*>(&facade);
00205     }
00206 
00207   private:
00209     //__host__ __device__
00210     //iterator_core_access(); //undefined
00211 }; // end iterator_core_access

00213 
00214 template<ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS>
00215   class iterator_facade
00216 {
00217   private:
00218     //
00219     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00220     //
00221     __host__ __device__
00222     Derived& derived()
00223     {
00224       return *static_cast<Derived*>(this);
00225     }
00226 
00227     __host__ __device__
00228     Derived const& derived() const
00229     {
00230       return *static_cast<Derived const*>(this);
00231     }
00232 
00233   public:
00234     typedef typename thrust::detail::remove_const<Value>::type value_type;
00235     typedef Reference                                          reference;
00236     typedef Pointer                                            pointer;
00237     typedef Difference                                         difference_type;
00238     typedef typename detail::iterator_facade_category<
00239       System, Traversal, Value, Reference
00240     >::type                                                    iterator_category;
00241 
00242     __host__ __device__
00243     reference operator*() const
00244     {
00245       return iterator_core_access::dereference(this->derived());
00246     }
00247 
00248     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00249     //     boost does to determine the return type
00250     pointer operator->() const
00251     {
00252       return this->derived();
00253     }
00254 
00255     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00256     //     boost does to determine the return type
00257     __host__ __device__
00258     reference operator[](difference_type n) const
00259     {
00260       return *(this->derived() + n);
00261     }
00262 
00263     __host__ __device__
00264     Derived& operator++()
00265     {
00266       iterator_core_access::increment(this->derived());
00267       return this->derived();
00268     }
00269 
00270     __host__ __device__
00271     Derived  operator++(int)
00272     {
00273       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00274       ++*this;
00275       return tmp;
00276     }
00277 
00278     __host__ __device__
00279     Derived& operator--()
00280     {
00281       iterator_core_access::decrement(this->derived());
00282       return this->derived();
00283     }
00284 
00285     __host__ __device__
00286     Derived  operator--(int)
00287     {
00288       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00289       --*this;
00290       return tmp;
00291     }
00292 
00293     __host__ __device__
00294     Derived& operator+=(difference_type n)
00295     {
00296       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), n);
00297       return this->derived();
00298     }
00299 
00300     __host__ __device__
00301     Derived& operator-=(difference_type n)
00302     {
00303       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), -n);
00304       return this->derived();
00305     }
00306 
00307     __host__ __device__
00308     Derived  operator-(difference_type n) const
00309     {
00310       Derived result(this->derived());
00311       return result -= n;
00312     }
00313 
00314   protected:
00315     typedef iterator_facade iterator_facade_;
00316 
00317 }; // end iterator_facade

00319 // Comparison operators
00320 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00321           ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00322 inline __host__ __device__
00323 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00324 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00325 bool
00326 operator ==(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00327             iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)
00328 {
00329   return iterator_core_access
00330     ::equal(*static_cast<Derived1 const*>(&lhs),
00331             *static_cast<Derived2 const*>(&rhs));
00332 }
00333 
00334 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00335           ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00336 inline __host__ __device__
00337 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00338 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00339 bool
00340 operator !=(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00341             iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)
00342 {
00343   return !iterator_core_access
00344     ::equal(*static_cast<Derived1 const*>(&lhs),
00345             *static_cast<Derived2 const*>(&rhs));
00346 }
00347 
00348 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00349           ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00350 inline __host__ __device__
00351 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00352 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00353 bool
00354 operator <(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00355            iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)
00356 {
00357   return 0 > iterator_core_access
00358     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Derived1 const*>(&lhs),
00359                     *static_cast<Derived2 const*>(&rhs));
00360 }

00365 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point

00369            iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)

00374 }

00383             iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)

00385   return 0 >= iterator_core_access

00390 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00391           ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00392 inline __host__ __device__
00393 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00394 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00395 bool
00396 operator >=(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00397             iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)
00398 {
00399   return 0 <= iterator_core_access
00400     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Derived1 const*>(&lhs),
00401                     *static_cast<Derived2 const*>(&rhs));
00402 }

00405 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(1),
00406           ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS_I(2)>
00407 inline __host__ __device__
00408 
00409 // divine the type this operator returns
00410 typename thrust::detail::distance_from_result<
00411   iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)>,
00412   iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)>
00413 >::type
00414 
00415 operator-(iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(1)> const& lhs,
00416           iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS_I(2)> const& rhs)
00417 {
00418   return iterator_core_access
00419     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Derived1 const*>(&lhs),
00420                     *static_cast<Derived2 const*>(&rhs));
00421 }

00423 // Iterator addition
00424 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS>
00425 inline __host__ __device__
00426 Derived operator+ (iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS> const& i,
00427                    typename Derived::difference_type n)
00428 {
00429   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00430   return tmp += n;
00431 }
00432 
00433 template <ITERATOR_FACADE_FORMAL_PARMS>
00434 inline __host__ __device__
00435 Derived operator+ (typename Derived::difference_type n,
00436                    iterator_facade<ITERATOR_FACADE_ARGS> const& i)
00437 {
00438   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00439   return tmp += n;
